name: Merge Market: Food Town
description:
Can you save your family, this town of cooks, and find all of the food before the big corporations take over? Find out the puzzle of why the big businesses want to take over your home and save the town!

Love to cook and discovering new recipes? Download now and relax with all of these delicious dishes.

Discover new foods from all over the world! Manage your restaurant empire! Merge the foods to create delicacies.Will you be the hero in this food game story? Discover the taste of the world with the power at your fingertips, play Merge Market now for free!


RELAX

No rush, this is a zone for fun and good times! This food game is not only relaxing, calming and tasty. It is therapeutic stress free game! Find some fruits, merge some food, do some decoration and chill out. Good times ahead!


PLAY AT YOUR OWN PACE!

Come back and play at any time, take a minute break play this food merge game and relax! Wanna play for an hour? No problem!


MERGE

Drag the same food together with another food to make a new yummy food then deliver it! Orders up! Merge food to complete deliveries to add decorations to your restaurants!

STORY

Help save the town, save your family and make them proud, you puzzle hero! You're the only thing preventing the big corporations from taking over in this merge story! Meet the top chefs in this one of a kind food game where you're the food master. Start off saving the family fruit and candy stand before helping save the rest of the town! Solve the puzzle and get rid of big businesses!

FOOD

Take your tastebuds on a relaxing food decoration vacation to eat your favorite fruit, candies, BBQ, desserts, Italian, Japanese and many more cuisines merge together from all over the world!


HOW TO PLAY

It is easy! Tap on the food generators to create new foods! Merge two of the same food together. They will make a new food then you can deliver the food or use it as a decoration for your restaurant! Merge and discover more food in this food game to get more deliveries! Discover new puzzles to help you save the restaurants in the town.

Play and merge in this one of a kind food game now for free!
